Class that handles some packets that are sent to the SMSModule-leader in a special way. More...

Detailed Description

Class that handles some packets that are sent to the SMSModule-leader in a special way.

int  nbrServices,
char **  phones,
char **  services
) 
 

Creates a SMSReader according to the specifications.

Parameters:
q The queue into which we insert the request to be handled by the processor.
loadedMaps Where to look for the currently loaded maps.
preferedPort The port to use if possible
definedRank Value used when voting for leader. High value indicated that the system administrator want this Module to be leader.

virtual void SMSReader::dumpMapData (   )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Definition at line 88 of file SMSReader.h.

bool SMSReader::leaderProcessCtrlPacket (  Packet *  p  )  [virtual]
 

Take care of some of the special control packets that might be received by the SMSModule-leader.

Calls the leaderProcessCtrlPacket in the super class to take care of the ``ordinary'' control packet.

Parameters:
p The incomming control packet.
Returns:
True if the packet was handled here or by the method in the superclass, false otherwise.

Reimplemented from StandardReader.
